text: O vi kred ne kill any game pilgrimage Anyone kills any game sur purpose his fine est a numer da livestock best est ekvivalent al game best li killed judgment set 2 equitable popol vi. Ili far sure ti offerings reach Ka bah. Otherwise li expiate feeding poor popol ekvivalent fast atone his offense DI PARDON offenses Se anyone returns al such offense DI testament vengx gxi! DI est Almighty Avenger
